title: Make Session header fully visible and free space for more chat messages

requirements.text: Update the Session page header (/html/body/div/div/div/header) so it is fully visible on phone-sized screens without any clipping or horizontal overflow. This must be implemented by changing ONLY the SessionPage header markup/styles (the <header> in frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx).

quotes: You see this i want the chat to be a big bigger seeing like 3 more messages and the header to be shown completely

acceptanceCriteria: On a narrow/mobile viewport, the entire header content (Leave button, session name/ID/host label, Documents/Player Documents buttons, members count, logout icon) is visible without being cut off.
Header content does not overflow horizontally; no element is partially off-screen.
No unintended page-level horizontal scrolling is introduced by the header.

requirements.text: Reduce the vertical height of the Session page header (/html/body/div/div/div/header) to provide more vertical space to the main content (chat), targeting enough reclaimed space to show approximately ~3 additional chat messages in the visible message list on mobile. Implement this ONLY by adjusting the headerâ€™s spacing/typography/layout in frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx (e.g., padding, gaps, font sizes, wrapping), without changing the chat component itself.

quotes: Perfect now because this part don't show up completely i need you to slace the chat a bit more than this to line up
You see this i want the chat to be a big bigger seeing like 3 more messages and the header to be shown completely

acceptanceCriteria: Compared to the current UI, the header occupies less vertical space on mobile (visibly shorter).
The chat message list visibly gains vertical space equivalent to ~3 message bubbles (approximate, not pixel-perfect).
No functional regressions: header buttons still work (Leave, Documents, Player Documents, Logout).

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element: the SessionPage header (<header> in frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx).
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the overall app theme or colors.
Do not modify chat scrolling/auto-scroll behavior as part of this change.
Do not change backend logic or data models.
